items.sentence: Tom plays poker with his friends every Friday night.
Tom is the only boy here who doesn\'t like baseball.
I shouldn\'t have gone home late at night by myself.
We like to drink a cup of coffee after eating lunch.
We need each other more now than we ever did before.
We saw Tom talking to Mary in the park this morning.
Tom didn\'t seem interested in what Mary was saying.
Tom didn\'t seem to be paying much attention to you.
Tom didn\'t seem to even notice that Mary was there.
Tom didn\'t seem to understand what you were saying.
